subject: Hockey, Ice
Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Chiropractors
lead_paragraph: Douglas Owen Nagel, who was arrested Tuesday on charges of distributing illegal performance-enhancing drugs, has seen several of the team’s players for routine chiropractic services.
snippet: Douglas Owen Nagel, who was arrested Tuesday on charges of distributing illegal performance-enhancing drugs, has seen several of the team’s players for routine chiropractic services.
